 • Psychological treatment for associated psychological problemsReferral for Pharmacological management / inpatient treatment to NIMHANS if required The clinic started its service from May 2014 onwards. It is first of its kind clinic in India to manage technology addiction. . 

 • The clinic runs exclusively as an outpatient service, on all working Saturdays at NIMHANS Urban Community centre for well being .
